pageContext.claim: “[Fentanyl]  is deadly. A little tiny spoonful can wipe out a state, it's hard to believe.”
pageContext.analysis: Fentanyl is an incredibly potent drug, but this is an exaggeration. The Associated Press did some diagnostics, “A teaspoon generally holds 4 to 6 grams, depending on the dry substance, equating to a theoretical death toll from fentanyl of 1,200 to 3,000,” which is not insignificant but is far from any state’s total population.
